title: Bought a Boost and can't log in
body:
i bought a boost so i could level up faster and i have been trying to log in for the past couple of hours but keep getting ERROR :003.
will i be refunded for the wasted time that i was planing to play in but couldn't because of this problem ?????

replies.body: We were having some patching and login issues earlier, but most players have been able to get back in the game and it does look like you've been able to play a good number of matches today. Let me know if you're still having this login problem though!

yes i did manage to log in but for two hours witch could equal three-ish games that are enough for me to almost level up again witch is the whole reason for me to play this amount of games and level up. i know im only taking about three-ish games i only care about the xp for now than actual playing. and i assume you should be able to see that i tried alot of times to log in during that time. Thank you :)
oh why im asking for these wasted hours that i could have played in is cuz as i mentioned at first that i spent RP to get xp boost for today :)
